name: Otis Spunkmeyer Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: Combine flour and baking powder in a small bowl, mix with a whisk, and set aside.
Mix together both sugars, salt and vanilla in a large mixing bowl and pour melted butter mixture over.
Add each egg separately, beating until creamy.
Add flour mixture 1/2 cup at a time while beating.
Refrigerate for 1 hour in a covered bowl.
Preheat oven to 375ï¿½ Drop cookies by large rounded tablespoonful onto a greased cookie sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.
